briefTitle: Open-Label Study of Deoxycholic Acid for the Reduction of Localized Subcutaneous Fat in the Submental Area
officialTitle: Multicenter, Open-label Study of ATX-101 (Sodium Deoxycholate Injection) for the Reduction of Localized Subcutaneous Fat in the Submental Area
summary: To evaluate the safety of deoxycholic acid subcutaneous injections in the submental area (below the chin).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 12 months after last treatment (maximum of 18 months from first treatment)
